pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatio-Temporal Uncertainty Propagation Across Multiple Scales // Provides several R functions for temporal aggregation of environmental variables used in e.g. Urban Drainage Models (UDMs), as precipitation and pollutants. Also, it provides methods and functions for uncertainty propagation via Monte Carlo simulation. This package, moreover, provides specific analysis functions for urban drainage system simulation to evaluate water quantity and quality in combined sewer overflows (CSOs).
